episodes.title: The Strange Cult of Synanon
episodes.description:
Synanon: some people will tell you it saved their life, some say it was a social experiment….At its core, it was a self-help rehab program that turned into a religion and then a cult. Today I’m going to tell it’s story; what Synanon is, how it came to be, it’s odd practices and ultimately what led to its downfall.

Join me for weekly true crime investigations and deep dives into cold case files, kidnappings, serial killers and more! 

SUBSCRIBE TO THE ARMCHAIR INVESTIGATOR SHOW!

This video is for you if you are interested in cults, what makes a cult, the strangest cults ever, the most dangerous cults, the biggest cults in history, the peoples temple, the cult of synanon, cult documentaries, cults in America, cults and extreme beliefs, cults that are still active, heaven's gate cult, cults explained
